translation.en: They came here to exterminate us.
They took our history and culture.
They covered our landmarks in dying humanity.
The wail of the dying carried for miles.
translation.ko: 죽어 가는 이들의 울부짖음이 멀리까지 울려 퍼졌다

translation.en: They're building some kind of breeding facility for those that survive.
translation.ko: 그것들은 살아남은 인간들을 위한 번식 시설을 짓고 있다

translation.en: People that have defected say it's worse than hell,
translation.ko: 도망친 이들은 그곳이 지옥보다 더 끔찍하다고 한다

translation.en: humans becoming some kind of surrogate incubators for the alien young.
translation.ko: 인간은 외계인의 번식을 위한 인큐베이터로 사용된다

translation.en: They killed us in waves when they first arrived.
translation.ko: 처음 지구에 온 그것들은 우리를 잇달아 몰살시켰다

translation.en: They built these megastructures that spew methane,
translation.ko: 그것들은 메탄가스를 내뿜는 거대 건축물을 지어 올려

translation.en: They've sown their crops, snuffing out our plant life,
translation.ko: 그것들이 기르는 작물 때문에 지구의 식물은 쓸려나갔고

translation.en: raising the global temperature, causing our cities to flood.
translation.ko: 전 세계의 기온이 올라가 도시들은 물에 잠겼다

translation.en: They waged war on Earth. They set fire to our forests.
translation.ko: 그것들은 지구에 전쟁을 선포하고 우리의 숲에 불을 질렀다

translation.en: impossible to breathe if you are close to the stacks.
translation.ko: 굴뚝 근처로 가면 호흡이 아예 불가능하다

translation.en: they hack into our psyche, into our minds, paralyzing us,
translation.ko: 그것들은 우리의 정신을 장악해 몸을 마비시키고

translation.en: taking control of the cerebrum and the limbic system,
We've been able to design a brain barrier that protects us from their influence.
translation.ko: 우리는 그 능력에서 뇌를 보호할 장비를 만들어냈다

translation.en: They know we can't produce enough of these for everyone,
translation.ko: 그것들은 이미 알고 있다 보호구의 수가 부족하고

translation.en: that it's just a matter of time before the entire planet is theirs.
translation.ko: 자신들이 이 행성을 차지하는 건 시간문제라는 것을

translation.en: I wonder if deep down, each person knows we're already dead.
translation.ko: 우리가 이미 죽은 목숨이란 걸 다들 마음속으로는 알고 있을까?

translation.en: I wonder if only one, sick, primordial instinct

translation.ko: 우리를 목적도 없이 계속 나아가게 만드는 걸까?

translation.en: Every rational thought tells us it's over.
translation.ko: 우리의 이성적인 부분은 가망이 없다고 말한다

translation.en: Every vile, deceptive, chemical emotion tells us it isn't.
translation.ko: 우리의 추하고 기만적이며 동물적인 감정은 그것을 부인한다

translation.en: We are sold a different story by our politicians.
[politician] Come with us! Do not be afraid!
-They want what's best for us! -Come on.
They have built a conservatory for us!
translation.ko: 그들은 우리를 위한 보호 구역을 건설했어요

translation.en: Come on, you freaky-faced fuck. Come on.
translation.ko: 빨리 와라, 이 괴물 자식, 어서

translation.en: Come on, come on, come on.
I'll go to the new conservatory.
[Sarah] Every once in a while, something goes our way.
Just one in a thousand. Just enough to keep fighting. Whoo!
translation.ko: 우리를 계속 싸워나가게 하는 천 번에 한 번 있을까 싶은 승리
사람들은 이 승리의 대가를 치를 것이다

translation.en: Even for small victories, it seemed that everything was lost.
translation.ko: 작은 승리를 몇 번 거두더라도 승산은 전혀 없어 보였다

translation.en: Humanity would soon cease to exist.
like angels carried on the rays of the aurora borealis.
Adapt or die, it was as simple as that.
In the old world, Nosh would have been locked up.
translation.ko: 옛 세계였다면 노시는 감옥에 갇혔을 것이다

translation.en: but here, he not only survived, he thrived.
translation.ko: 하지만 이 세계는 그에게 최고의 환경이었다

translation.en: [Sarah] Nosh could make just about anything out of scavenged junk.
translation.ko: 노시는 주워 모은 쓰레기로 뭐든 만들 수 있었다

translation.en: We needed him, and he knew it.
translation.ko: 우리는 그가 필요했고 노시도 그것을 알았다

translation.en: No. We need more than that.
Everything has a price, and we can pay you.
I'm glad these fucking things came here.
translation.ko: 난 그 망할 것들이 와서 기뻐

translation.en: They mean that I get to burn whatever I see.
translation.ko: 이제 보이는 건 뭐든 태울 수 있으니까

translation.en: Every day. Every night. No laws. No fucking jails.
translation.ko: 매일 밤이든 낮이든 법도 없고 감옥도 없지

translation.en: What is it with you and the fucking fire?
translation.ko: 망할 불에 왜 그렇게 집착하는 거야?

translation.en: I'll die and perish in the fire someday.
translation.ko: 언젠가 나는 불 속에서 죽을 거야

translation.en: You say you need my help? For what?
For a fucking hope for things to go back to the way they were?
translation.ko: 세상이 원래대로 돌아갈 거라는 빌어먹을 희망 때문에?

translation.en: Just give me… give me some bait.
I just need some bait, some of your people…
translation.ko: 당신 사람들 몇 명만 미끼로 줘

translation.en: some of your people, some of the sick you don't need--
translation.ko: 병들어서 필요 없는 사람들 몇 명만…

translation.en: I'm two seconds away from blowing this motherfucker's head off.
It would be so good. So much fun. Just a little more!
translation.ko: 멋질 거야, 정말 재미있겠지 조금만 더!

translation.en: Give me some bait. Give me some bait. It'll make the "boom" bigger.
translation.ko: 미끼만 몇 명 줘 폭발이 훨씬 더 커질 거야

translation.en: I'll take out an entire convoy. That'll help you, right?
translation.ko: 수송대 전체를 날려 버릴게 그럼 당신에게 도움이 되겠지?

translation.en: I have enough ordnance to make this fire breathe hot.
[Sarah] Some sick people in exchange for Nosh's item.
translation.ko: 노시의 물건 대신 병든 사람 몇 명

translation.en: In peacetime, such an offer would be insane.
[man over radio] Ma'am, we've done everything we can. He's not responding.
translation.ko: 할 수 있는 건 다 해 봤습니다 반응이 없어요

translation.en: [Sarah] We picked up Amir in Sector 7.
At first, they thought he was dead, some refuse from one of their experiments.
translation.ko: 처음엔 실험 끝에 버려진 시체라고만 생각했다

translation.en: I'm not going to hurt you.
Kill him. Just fucking kill him.
All that shit they put in his head.
I'm not going to hurt you.
We've gotta check the wounded, ma'am.
I need to ask you for a favor.
[Sarah] It's okay, it's okay. It's fine.
I need to see what it did to you.
[Sarah] This world had changed all of us…
translation.ko: 이 세상은 우리 모두를 바꿔 놓았다

translation.en: To try to make it how it was before.
To stop those beasts from doing more of this…
translation.ko: 그 짐승들이 하는 짓을 막기 위해서요

translation.en: What is it with her and that fucking thing?
translation.ko: 세라는 저 망할 것이랑 왜 저러는 거죠?

translation.en: [Jasper] The ones that are experimented on, who survive…
Her theory is, it's because they have some kind of predisposition.
translation.ko: 세라는 그 사람들에게 어떤 자질이 있다고 생각해

translation.en: [Sarah] These men are trying to stop the genocide.
translation.ko: 이 사람들은 인류 학살을 막으려는 거예요
자기 목숨을 희생할 준비가 되어 있죠

translation.en: They don't have to die tonight.
translation.ko: 저들은 오늘 밤 죽지 않아도 돼요

translation.en: Help us. Please. Tell me what futures you see.
translation.ko: 제발 우릴 도와줘요 당신이 보는 미래를 알려줘요

translation.en: [man 2] Incoming! Pulling in on your six.
translation.ko: 접근 중! 바로 뒤에 차를 대겠다

translation.en: [Sarah] You can help us turn the tide, Amir.
translation.ko: 당신이 도와주면 형세를 뒤집을 수 있어요

translation.en: Threat down in Fox Squadron. Threat down.
All right, everyone, triple-check those brain locks.
translation.ko: 좋아, 전원 뇌 보호구를 다시 확인하도록

translation.en: I don't want anyone looking at it,
and keep out of its line of sight, right?
Do you see us winning, Amir?
[Sarah] Can we learn to hunt them?
Can we make them fear us?
Do you remember what they did to you?
They do experiments all day and all night.
That fucking thing! Don't let it get away!
translation.ko: 망할 괴물 같으니 도망가게 두지 마!

translation.en: But every once in a while, a miracle happens.
One in ten million, like you.
translation.ko: 천만 명 중 하나 당신 같은 기적이요

translation.en: Those things have given you an amazing power.
Don't look at it! Look away!
You can do the things they do.
translation.ko: 당신은 그것들과 같은 능력을 갖고 있어요

translation.en: Put it down, Martinez! Put it down!
Don't do it, Martinez! Don't do it!
Amir, it's time. You have to use what they gave you.
translation.ko: 아미르, 시간이 됐어요 그것들이 준 능력을 사용해요
